title: Canyon joins cycle to work provider Cyclescheme
content:
Will Strickson
15 Apr 2021

German bike manufacturer has partnered with the cycle to work provider to offer their full range to workers whose companies use the scheme

Canyon has joined with cycle to work provider Cyclescheme, offering its full range of bikes to workers with access to the scheme.

Through Cyclescheme employees whose company is signed up can save between 25% and 39% on a Canyon bike, paying nothing up front with monthly payments taken directly from their salary.

While cycle to work schemes largely promote bikes for commuting, Canyon's deal with Cyclescheme goes far beyond the rat race as the German brand is offering its full range of bikes for purchase including some of the world's best road bikes, gravel bikes, mountain bikes and e-bikes.

Canyon has also integrated the purchasing journey into its website, including a savings calculator that will tell you exactly how much buying one of its bikes through the scheme will save you.

Aaron Budd, Canyon's UK head of sales and marketing, said, 'We're so excited to launch a new, flexible buying tool to our UK customers. Changing up your commuting habits, even if it's just one or two journeys a week by bike, is so beneficial to your health and the environment.'

So if you just haven't been able to justify splashing out on an Aeroad or if a Grail:On is normally just outside of your price range or if you just want to start cycling to work post-lockdown, it's worth checking whether your employer is signed up to Cyclescheme and how much it would save you.

For more information on Cyclescheme visit cyclescheme.co.uk
